text: SNC-Lavalin is a Canadian engineering company based in Montreal. It was founded in 1911 by Arthur Surveyer. It faces charges of corruption, in connection with bribery in Libya.https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/montreal/snc- lavalin-trial-corruption-bribery-1.5153429 SNC-Lavalin is the largest construction company in Canada, as of 2018. ==References== == Other websites == * SNC-Lavalin official website Category:1910s establishments in Canada Category:1911 establishments Category:Technology companies of Canada Category:Companies listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange Category:Companies based in Montreal
title: SNC-Lavalin
